Articles.Content: Is there some way or mod to reduce the endless bounce of kerbals in low gravity? I had a Kerbonaut bounce for FOUR KILOMETERS on Minimus.
Try not hitting the ground so fast with them. They're living trampolines.

I am constantly seeing phantom forces when leaving a ladder which by no means look like gravity. I don't quite know how to deal with it except to make sure each time there's no horizontal movement so that Kerbals just fall down and stop moving, which is better than bouncing to random places.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97285-KSP-v1-0-4-Stock-Bug-Fix-Modules-%28Release-v1-0-4b-1-24-Jul-15%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97285-KSP-v1-0-4-Stock-Bug-Fix-Modules-%28Release-v1-0-4b-1-24-Jul-15%29)

This should fix the ladder problems.
I once slid 8 kilometers on Bop, its like a terrifying slow motion car crash.
